name: GLX-Racing Demo
description:
GLX-Racing is a racing game featuring various types of vehicles (some better suited for racing than others) and tracks ranging from purpose built race circuits to street racing courses and open highway circuits. The corner stone of the game is the scratch made physics system designed to provide semi-realistic car handling whilst remaining easy to play even with a keyboard.

This demo version contains 3 cars of various performance classes and drive-layouts and 1 track (a street racing course set in a small town centre). It has
two game modes: practice and quick race against bots.
